head.title: Summer holidays at a holiday home | Interhome
head.description: Enjoy your summer at a holiday home  Summer at a holiday home – long lie-ins, breakfast on the terrace, playing and/or reading in the garden, cosy barbecues in the evening… If that sounds like the relaxing and refreshing holiday of your dreams, why not rent a holiday house or apartment with Interhome for your summer holiday? A holiday home is the perfect way to enjoy a break with the family. There are often plenty of entertainment options available, so the little ones won’t get bored and the parents can also relax from time to time! Discover idyllic locations and enjoy the extensive range of accommodation available with Interhome

links.label: Spend your summer holiday relaxing in your own villa or apartment

content.title: Spend your summer holiday relaxing in your own villa or apartment

content.textLeft:
Summer at a holiday home – long lie-ins, breakfast on the terrace, playing and/or reading in the garden, cosy barbecues in the evening…

If that sounds like the relaxing and refreshing holiday of your dreams, why not rent a holiday house or apartment with Interhome for your summer holiday? A holiday home is the perfect way to enjoy a break with the family.
content.textRight:
There are often plenty of entertainment options available, so the little ones won’t get bored and the parents can also relax from time to time! 

Discover idyllic locations and enjoy the extensive range of accommodation available with Interhome.

content.headline: Safety in your holiday home!
content.key: Safe hand-over of the key on-site

elements.title: Hand-picked and tested accommodation
elements.subtitle: Quality is our number one priority
elements.caption: Every property is checked before your arrival to ensure the best possible stay.

elements.title: In-resort service and a 24/7 helpline
elements.subtitle: Make the most of our experience
elements.caption: Key collection is arranged by our helpful staff.  Available 24/7 or on-site service to help you with all your questions, e.g.: tips and insights for your holiday destination and your booked accommodation.

elements.title: A unique holiday experience
elements.subtitle: Privacy and freedom in your own holiday home
elements.caption: Be your own boss, eat whenever you want and make the most of plenty of space for all your friends and family.

elements.title: Why Choose Interhome?
elements.caption: It has never been easier to find your perfect holiday. Do you want to explore new travel destinations? There is no better way than from a holiday home: Enjoy "la dolce vita" in Italy, feel the charming lifestyle of the French Riviera or the Spanish way of life. Be inspired by our travel ideas and book online - quick, easy, and secure with Interhome.

elements.title: Freedom, privacy and space in your own holiday home
elements.caption: Your stay in a holiday house or a holiday apartment offers plenty of advantages: spend your time exactly as you want. No disturbance from other guests or hotel staff, just spend your holiday according to your own rules. Whether you are looking for a city trip, a relaxing holiday with your family or with friends. Simply enjoy lots of room, flexibility and freedom in your holiday home.
